title.narrative: Support for the improvement of the "International Health Regulation" system in the republic of Sudan
Supporto al miglioramento del sistema di International Health Regulation nella repubblica del Sudan

description.narrative: Il progetto segue le linee guida dell’ IHR/WHO 2005, orientate a rafforzare le capacita’ basilari del Paese nel prevenire, rilevare velocemente, e rispondere adeguatamente e prontamente a potenziali rischi sanitari, conseguenti all’attraversamento dei confini nazionali ( PoE) da parte di persone, animali, merci, e minacciare la salute della popolazione sudanese

The aim of the initiative is supporting the improvement of The “International Health Regulations System” adopted by the Health Assembly in 1969 whose aim is “to prevent, protect against, control and provide a public health response to the international spread of disease of public health risks, and which avoid unnecessary interference with international traffic and trade.” The Objective of the program is strengthening the core capacities for preventing, early detecting, and responding to the potential risks that have the potential to cross borders to protect the public health security as required by IHR/2005
